Recipe.Name: Nanner Pah
Recipe.Description: The famous "Nanner Pah", which is how an old Kentucky grandma I knew said, "Banana Pie". Mmm-mm!

Instructions.Step: Line a glass baking dish with Nilla Wafers.
Put a layer of pudding over the wafers. Use maybe half the pudding.
Slice half of the bananas over the pudding.
Repeat all four layers, finishing with Cool Whip.
If you've got anything left over, don't give it to the dog, 'cuz it'll make him sick. And if he gits sick, you're the one to clean it up!
